title: Understanding the Spelling Dialog Box
text: The spelling dialog box is a tool that helps identify words that are not in the standard dictionary. It provides suggestions for corrections and allows you to add new words to the dictionary.

title: Proofreading vs. Spelling Dialog Box
text: While proofreading involves manually checking for errors, the spelling dialog box automatically highlights words that are not recognized by the dictionary.

title: Identifying the Correct Tool
text: Which tool is specifically designed to find words not in the standard dictionary?
